edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file
Class SampleSentenceData

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file.SampleSentenceData
Direct Known Subclasses:
SampleFrameFactory, SampleIndexFactory, SampleTemplateFactory
public abstract class SampleSentenceData
extends Object

Caches data related to sample sentences, loading and caching the data file content only when it's accessed.

Constructor Summary

          No-argument constructor.

Method Detail

getValue

protected Object getValue(SynsetType type,
                          Object key)
Returns a value from the submap that's associated with a particular synset type.

Parameters:
type - Type of synset for which to retrieve a value.
key - Key associated with the value to return.
Returns:
Value that was stored or null if the data does not exist.

getResourceBundleName

protected String getResourceBundleName()
Returns the name of the resource bundle that contains the synset type / data file name mappings.

Returns:
Name of the resource bundle file that contains mappings.

Adds an entry to the map.

Parameters:

key - Key to use when storing the entry.
